resources.string:
Name: Aidan O'Connor
Address: 8 College Road, Castleisland, Co. Kerry
Telephone: 086-1798383
Email: aidanmoconnor@gmail.com
Date of Birth: 6th April 1987


Skills Profile:

Programming – Java.
Graphic Design – Excellent knowledge of Adobe Photoshop, InDesign & Illustrator.
Multimedia – Adobe Flash & ActionScript.
Databases – MySQL & Oracle.
Web Development – HTML, CSS, Javascript, JQuery, PHP, Adobe Dreamweaver & WordPress.
Marketing – CRMs such as Salesforce & Zoho CRM. Knowledge of Google Analytics, Adwords, Social Media & Email marketing.
Networks – Experience of Windows Server, configuring routers & switches.


Language Skills:

• Leaving Certificate (Honours Level) French.
• Junior Certificate (Honours Level) German.


Hobbies/Interests:

Technology, Web, Film, Reading, Music, Soccer, GAA, Basketball, Rugby, Boxing.

2004 - 2008
\nInstitute of Technology Tralee
\nBSc (Honours) in Computing with Multimedia Degree
\nSubjects included: Java Programming, Databases, Multimedia & Web Development, Graphic Design, E-Business, Networks & Operating Systems.
\nOverall result: GPA of 3.46 (First Class Honours).

\n\n2011 - 2012
\nInstitute of Technology Tralee
\nCert in Social Media & Web Analytics
\nSubjects included: Web Analytics, Customer Experience Management, Digital Marketing & Social Media Software.

\n\n2013 - 2014
\nInstitute of Technology Tralee
\nCert in Mobile Applications Design & Development
\nSubjects included: Native Mobile App Development, Mobile Web App Development, Design for Mobile Devices, Java & Interactive Interfaces.

\n2013
\nFETAC Level 6 – Train the Trainer
\nCertified Trainer Qualification
\nEquipped with the skills and knowledge to run, manage and deliver effective training programmes.

Kerry Flyer, Limerick Rd, Castleisland, Co. Kerry
\nMay 2013 – Present
\nPosition: IT Administrator
\nResponsibilities
\n• IT Support for staff members.
\n• Investigate & Diagnose Network Problems.
\n• Hardware Maintenance & Testing.
\n• Configuration & Installation of IT Solutions.
\n• Website Design.
\n• Managing Company\'s Salesforce System & Server.
\n• Provide G.I.B.O. Training using Blacknight\'s services.
\n• Provide Benefit 4 Training.
\n• Social Media & Marketing.

\n\nAetna Inc., Tralee Rd, Castleisland, Co. Kerry
\n2008 – Aug 2011
\nPosition: Claims Benefit Specialist
\nResponsibilities
\n• Analysing & approving medical claims that cannot be auto adjudicated.
\n• Applying medical necessity guidelines, identifying discrepancies & applying cost containment measures to assist in the claim adjudication process.
\n• Liaising with other team members regarding specific issues.
\n• Advising supervisors on any areas where delays in the process could be eliminated.
\n• Adhering to & meeting performance & production targets on a monthly basis.

\n\nWalsh Colour Print, Tralee Rd, Castleisland, Co. Kerry
\nSummer 2007
\nPosition: Graphic Designer
\nResponsibilities
\n• Provided Graphic Design services using software such as Photoshop, Illustrator & Quark.
\n• Assessed clients\' needs & developed successful designs for promotion, marketing & collateral materials across a wide variety of industries.
\n• Established rapport with clients, communicated vision of project while ensuring clients\' ultimate satisfaction.
\n• Ensured consistently met client deadlines through project management & coordinating milestones against timetables.

\n

Our Services

\nI design & develop routes to market, product marketing tools & unique communication mediums to reach target audiences & achieve strategic client objectives.

\nMobile App Development
\nI can build high quality native Android mobile applications. I also specialise in hybrid & responsive applications targeting iOS, Android & Windows phones & tablets.

\n\nWeb Design
\n• Responsive Website Design
\n• Content Management Systems

\n\nGraphic Design
\n• Print Design
\n• Corporate Identity
\n• Photography

\n\nDigital Strategy
\n• Search Engine Optimisation (SEO)
\n• Social Media
\n• Online Advertising
\n• Web Analytics

\n

Websites

\nIrish Road Safety - Driver\'s Education
\nhttp://www.irishroadsafety.ie
\nThis is an online e-leaning application developed using Adobe Flash, PHP & SQL. It was designed to help educate learner drivers on different aspects of road safety. Additionally the website provides the user with a driver theory test which is designed to help the user in preparation for the official driver theory test.

\n\nPresentation Secondary School Website
\nhttp://www.presentationcastleisland.ie
\nThis website was developed using WordPress. It provides a detailed outline of Presentation Secondary School including a gallery & contact information.

\n\n

Mobile Applications

\nTraining Room Booking System
\nA prototype of a training room booking system for Kerry Flyer. This app was developed using MIT App Inventor. User data is stored in a SQLite database.

\n\nLifeScan
\nThis is a QR code generator app. It generates a QR code containing the user’s personal & medical information. This is a hybrid app created with HTML, CSS & JavaScript.

\n\n

Graphic Design

\nView my graphic design portfolio
